tag_list: vacation-rentals, costa-rica, hawaii, palm-springs, san-diego, property-manager
overview: Currently, Josh is focused on changing the way property management and vacation rentals are done throughout the world. Through GoodLifeRetreats.com, Josh is using his site and voice to help owners achieve higher occupancy rates for their vacation rentals. In the process, a new property management system will be born that allows travelers a safe trusted vacation rental AND will allow owners to take the worry out of owning a second home.
